title: S16 Ep47: Supernatural News/Parashare: DIY Exorcisms Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: DIY Exorcisms Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare DIY Exorcisms Edition

Dave & Tim reflect on friends we have lost in the paranormal field and discuss the high strangeness of this past week. DIY Exorcisms are on the rise, weird things are happening to Cattle in Oregon, a ghost boy caught on dash cam in Australia, a woman seeks the light and finds it....all this PLUS your emails and a Brand New Theater of the Mind.

Check out all the great books and paranormal swag in our Darkness Radio Amazon Shop!

Visit here: www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

To see Dave & Tim Live visit here: www.DarknessEvents.com
